Pre-Game Insights: Croatia need a win to continue their campaign at Euro 2024.Croatia have two disappointing displays so far, leaving them with only one point.Head coach Zlatko Dalic is likely to rotate his lineup.Nikola Vlasic is out due to injury, but Dalic has 25 players available.Marcelo Brozovic may be dropped to the bench, with Luka Sucic or Martin Baturina potentially starting.Luka Modric and Mateo Kovacic are likely to start, having earned over 100 caps.Bruno Petkovic missed a penalty and was substituted, so Ante Budimir could start.Josko Gvardiol is expected to continue in defense, and Borna Sosa may be in contention.Croatia's possible starting lineup includes Livakovic; Stanisic, Sutalo, Gvardiol, Sosa; Modric, Sucic, Kovacic; Pasalic, Budimir, Kramaric.
